A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Tedium. The dialogue was flat\, character development was nonexistent\, and there was a lot of wasted time. The attempted humor made me think I was watching a movie for 5 year olds. Also Poe wasn't a real character. Poe had no personality he was a plot point they forced down our throats\, followed by pink hair getting everyone killed because she\, for no reason\, didn't want to give people hope.  I want the writers of Star Wars to know that this if the first movie review I have ever done\, because I was so disappointed with a series that I loved. This movie felt like a slap in the face to Star Wars fans.
